reference: For further details, see https://gssdataexplorer.norc.org. Consult https://census.gov for more information about occupation codes.
description:
Description
Wage data from the General Social Survey (1974-2018) to illustrate
wage discrepancies by gender (while also considering respondent occupation, age, and education).
title: The Gender Pay Gap in the General Social Survey

parameters.maritalcat: respondent's marital status (Married, Widowed, Divorced, Separated, Never Married)
parameters.wrkstat: the work status of the respondent (full-time, part-time, temporarily not working, unemployed (laid off), retired, school, housekeeper, other)
parameters.occrecode: recode of the occupation code into one of 11 main categories
parameters.realrinc: the respondent's base income (in constant 1986 USD)
parameters.educcat: respondent's degree level (Less Than High School, High School, Junior College, Bachelor, or Graduate)
